query.mssql: create table {0} ([ReportSessionId] varchar(256) NOT NULL, [Document] nvarchar(max) NOT NULL, [Hyperlink] nvarchar(max) NOT NULL, [Id] [int] NOT NULL, [Exported] nvarchar(max) NOT NULL, [Note] nvarchar(max) NOT NULL, [IOHyperlink] nvarchar(max) NOT NULL, [OrderId] [int] NOT NULL)
query.postgres: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS {0} (ReportSessionId citext NOT NULL, document citext NOT NULL, hyperlink citext NOT NULL, id int NOT NULL, exported citext NOT NULL, note citext NOT NULL, iohyperlink citext NOT NULL, orderid int NOT NULL)

query.default: select Document, Hyperlink, Id, Exported, Note, IOHyperlink from Sungero_Reports_FinArchExport where ReportSessionId = @ReportSessionId order by OrderId
